page.title: 17Red Deer near Exford
page.content: Red deer live on Exmoor,their fur is reddish brown. In spring the stags lose their antlers and when the new ones grow they are soft like velvet. The stags rubs the velvet off until the hard horn shows.You can tell the difference between stags and hinds because only stags have antlers.The stags fight to see who is the leader of the herd. Red deer eat grass and bark,sometimes they eat vegetables. They are hunted because too many of them would be a nuisance to farmers. The meat is very nice, it is called venison. When they are hunting, the huntsman does not get confused if the stag goes into a bunch of stags,he knows it as it is the hottest one. Deer hooves have slots in them so they don't sink in boggy ground.
